current.product_tab_desc_2:
Camel milk has been used for centuries as a natural remedy.

DromeDairy Naturals Camel Milk Powder is considerably cheaper than our competitors because the dairy manages over 2,000 dromedary camels and will milk between 600-800 camels at any given time. Camel milk is all-natural, and contains no hormones or antibiotics and is easy to prepare any time. It is for the sophisticated, health conscious shopper looking for a nutritious dairy alternative.

  • No Hormones
  • No Antibiotics
  • No Additives
  • No Preservatives
  • All-Natural Probiotic
  • Gluten Free

current.sidebar_customhtml:
DromeDairy Naturals Camel Milk Powder is made from 100% camel milk. Our drying and pasteurization method protects the nutritional properties of camel milk. Camel milk’s countless health benefits and creamy consistency make it the perfect dairy alternative.

  • No Hormones
  • No Antibiotics
  • No Additives
  • No Gluten
  • No Preservatives

Great tasting Camel Milk. Nothing added. Nothing removed.

My reaction to camel milk was a delightful surprise. I really enjoy it every morning in both coffee and tea.
I've recently read a lot about camel milk but wasn't really sure what to expect.  I was pleasently surprised by both the taste and how easy it was for me to digest.  I will definitely order again.
This camel milk has made delicious smoothies and ice cream.  So far I haven't reacted to it as I do cow and goat milk.  I think it helped me detox because I feel much better afterwards.
